title: Comic Sans type font
content:
I need to know the names of the two different fonts used here. No judging! I hate them but need to identify what they are.

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415111714im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Fonts_5065.png)

Thanks oldnick and Dpape!

Font: 

 TooneyNoodle and Apple Casual 

Solved By: 

 [oldnick](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415111714/http:/typophile.com/user/6470 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Fonts.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415111714/http:/typophile.com/files/Fonts.png) | 60.15 KB |
author: bobmarley65

comments.content:
And the other looks like: Apple Computer/Apple Casual

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415111714im_/http:/typophile.com/files/subject1_3536.jpg)
 (bad letter spacing and all)
It looks like Charlie Pointed owed a lot to the much earlier (1930) [Ashley Crawford](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415111714/http:/old.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/ashley-crawford/).
